subject: Rodeos
Bull Riding
lead_paragraph: Since October 2009, no cowboy has ridden Bushwacker, the toughest bull to ride on the Professional Bull Riders tour, for even eight seconds, the minimum needed to earn a score.
snippet: Since October 2009, no cowboy has ridden Bushwacker, the toughest bull to ride on the Professional Bull Riders tour, for even eight seconds, the minimum needed to earn a score.
